name: Kokoro
title: The Healing Spirit
subtitle: A graceful healer who combines martial arts with spiritual healing powers
lore: A skilled practitioner of Ba Ji Quan and spiritual healing arts, Kokoro balances her training as a martial artist with her innate ability to heal and protect others. Her gentle nature belies her formidable combat skills, making her a valuable ally who can both sustain her teammates and control the battlefield with her mystical abilities.

passive.name: Spiritual Aura
passive.description: Kokoro's abilities that assist teammates grant them and herself a bonus [7%] damage reduction.

Q.name: Harmony's Embrace
Q.description: Kokoro restores [100/230/380/550/680] health to nearby allies and herself. The cooldown of this ability is reduced by 1 second for each successful auto attack Kokoro lands.

W.name: Healing Strikes
W.description: Upon activation, Kokoro's auto attacks heal the ally with the lowest HP by [30/40/55/70/90] for 5 seconds. Additionally, Kokoro gains [0.15/0.20/0.35/0.40/0.50] bonus attack speed.

E.name: Silencing Ring
E.description: Kokoro sends out a purple magical ring in a targeted direction. The first enemy hit is rooted and silenced for 1.5 seconds. The ability also deals [40/70/140/200/300] damage.

R.name: Guardian's Shield
R.description: Kokoro grants a shield to all nearby allies and herself, absorbing [1200/2500/3075] damage for 2 seconds.

1.name: Ring Empowerment
1.description: Hitting Silencing Ring increases your next healing or shielding ability by [22%].

1.name: Magic Strikes
1.description: Kokoro's autoattacks deal additional [10%] as magic damage. Her W cooldown is decreased by [5s].

1.name: Unity Speed
1.description: Kokoro gains increased movement speed/nearby allies [25%/ally].

5.name: Life Force
5.description: Using W grants Kokoro [35%] lifesteal for the duration.

5.name: Quick Cast
5.description: Reducing the cooldown of Kokoro's each basic abilities by [3s] but increases their mana cost by [40].

5.name: Enhanced Protection
5.description: Your passive now reduces [10%] damage for the duration.

10.name: United Shield
10.description: Increases the shield amount of your R/ally assisted by [8%/ally] - Kokoro doesn't count.

10.name: Purifying Shield
10.description: Guardian's Shield also cleanses all negative status effects (silences, slows, etc.) from allies when applied.

15.name: Enhanced Reduction
15.description: Kokoro gains [2%] more bonus damage reduction buff from her abilities.

15.name: Healing Focus
15.description: Item: Select an ally and grant them [+10%] Healing receive buff. Can be only active on 1 ally. [60s cd].

15.name: Ring of Weakness
15.description: Hitting an enemy with Silencing Ring makes them take [10%] more damage for the duration.

20.name: Spirit Lifesteal
20.description: Allies gain [4%] lifesteal if they have Spiritual Aura buff (Kokoro Included).

20.name: Enhanced Guardian
20.description: Guardian's Shield now lasts for 5 seconds and grants [30%] increased movement speed to shielded allies.

20.name: Chain Ring
20.description: Silencing Ring can spread from affected enemies.
